about_the_game:
As the innkeeper, your journey begins with the assembly and training of a band of heroes. You scour the land, seeking out valiant warriors, elusive saboteurs, and sharp-eyed rangers. Under your guidance, these skilled individuals forge into a formidable team. With specialized skills and expertly chosen equipment, they embark on perilous journeys for fame and fortune, aiding the innocent and vanquishing evil.


Under your guidance, these skilled individuals forge into a formidable team. With specialized skills and expertly chosen equipment, they embark on perilous journeys for fame and fortune, aiding the innocent and vanquishing evil.



As your heroes' renown grows, so too does your tavern. Unlock new rooms and amenities, transforming the modest tavern into a lively hub of activity. The aroma of delicious feasts wafts through the air as patrons gather in the dining room, while the entertainment room buzzes with excitement from thrilling knife-throwing competitions. Your inn evolves into an opulent refuge, where luxurious bedrooms adorned with fine art and hunting trophies welcome weary travelers.


The aroma of delicious feasts wafts through the air as patrons gather in the dining room, while the entertainment room buzzes with excitement from thrilling knife-throwing competitions. Your inn evolves into an opulent refuge, where luxurious bedrooms adorned with fine art and hunting trophies welcome weary travelers.


But this is just the beginning of your journey. With each success, you are inspired to build a legacy of legendary inns, each more illustrious than the last. From bustling market towns to the remote corners of the realm, your taverns boast unique ambiance, entertainment, and culinary delights, drawing travelers from near and far.


As the tales of your exceptional establishments spread, caravans arrive from distant lands, eager to trade and replenish their supplies. Your keen negotiation skills secure lucrative deals, bolstering your inns' prosperity and ensuring their continued growth.


Amidst this thriving business, your tavern becomes a beacon for mercenaries, drawn by the promise of camaraderie and opportunity. With each new ally, your guild's reputation soars, and more heroes answer the call to embark on even the most dangerous of quests.


In this enchanting idle game, every decision you make has far-reaching consequences as you strive to build the ultimate tavern empire. Will you rise to the challenge and etch your name into history as a legendary innkeeper? The story of your legendary journey awaits...

Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS X 10 or later
  • Processor: Apple M1 or any Intel CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS X 13 or later
  • Processor: Apple M1 or any Intel CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G5400 / AMD Ryzen 3 2200G
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / Nvidia GeForce 710 / AMD Radeon HD 6450
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 6000 / Nvidia GeForce 720 / AMD Radeon HD 5570
  • Storage: 500 GB available space

short_description: Once upon a time, in a realm of danger and intrigue, you find yourself entrusted with the management of a quaint medieval tavern. This captivating idle game weaves a tale of daring quests, legendary heroes, and a thriving tavern that serves as the heart of a bustling community.
